description: This quarter-zip pullover is made from supersmooth jersey and finished with our signature embroidered Pony.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 30½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, a 58" chest, and a 37½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 33½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, a 58" chest, and a 39½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Signature embroidered pony at the left chest.
Shell: cotton, viscose, nylon. Cuffs and hem: cotton, viscose, elastane.
